Package gamelogic.model

Class DotsAndBoxesGame

java.lang.Object
gamelogic.model.DotsAndBoxesGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game
public class DotsAndBoxesGame extends Object implements Game
A class representing a game of Dots and Boxes. Inspired from TicTacToeGame from the TicTacToe project of Software Systems, week 5.

      public BasicPlayer getWinner()
      Description copied from interface: Game

    • toggleTurn

      public void toggleTurn()
      Toggles the turns of the players whenever a line is drawn. If a player completes a box, they get another turn.

    • updateScores

      public void updateScores()
      Description copied from interface: Game
      Updates the scores of the players when boxes have been drawn. A completed box corresponds to a score increase of 1.
      Specified by:
      updateScores in interface Game
